name: valkyria chronicles inspired battle system
description:
A Valkyria Chronicles inspired battle system, all the assets are from internet, not to be used in a final game

Made in GODOT 4

UV assets used from kenny,

Faces from https://ladadori.itch.io/realistic-avatars-for-rpg;
